name: TFT-LCD View Box 150,4x44,2x2,5 cm.
descr: Chiroform High-Tec View Boxes uses the latest CCFL Lamp technology which emits an 8600 kelvin colour temperature. This produces a blue-type light more suitable for reading X-ray (black and white films). The backlight technology, is the same used in laptop computers, and distributes the light evenly. The uniformity of light distribution is more then 90%. This facilitates more accurate film reading, while reducing eye strain thereby enabling viewing for longer periods of time.
